name: Desert of Vice (itch)
description:
“‘Desert of Vice’ has it all: surreal scenes, a spooky mystery, coffee and donuts.” - Waypoint VICE

“For those looking to get lost in a realm where their sanity will be tested as they work deeper into an intriguing story, it offers some otherworldly mysteries to unravel.” - Indie Games

Desert of Vice - a horror text adventure game. Solve the mystery of an isolated town in the middle of a desert in this new Lovecraftian adventure game! Type the desired command and see the action come to life! 

Key features: 

  • A story rich adventure. 
  • Choice dependent multiple endings. 
  • Unique text based controls. 
  • Tailor made soundtrack by @cesque. 

Inspired by the works of Franz Kafka and H.P. Lovecraft.
